thread.title: Trump To ESPN: I'm Not Doing A March Madness Bracket This Year
thread.title_full: Trump To ESPN: I'm Not Doing A March Madness Bracket This Year

author: Christine Rousselle
title: Trump To ESPN: I'm Not Doing A March Madness Bracket This Year
text:
Share Tweet 
For each year of Barack Obama's presidency, he made a big production of filling out a March Madness bracket on camera for ESPN. While his picks weren't the most accurate , it was still somewhat fun to see how his picks stacked up against ordinary Americans. 
This year, however, the presidential bracket challenge is no more. ESPN had reached out to President Donald Trump to see if he'd like to continue this new tradition and fill out a bracket come March--but Trump "respectfully declined." ESPN's comment: We expressed our interest to the White House in continuing the presidential bracket. They have respectfully declined. https://t.co/U2cKGLfkXh â€” Mike Soltys (@espnmikes) February 15, 2017 
Kind of sad, but understandable as Trump has never really been known to be a big NCAA basketball fan. His alma mater, UPenn, last appeared in the tournament in 2007.
